name: Arcade Galaxy Builder
description:
Welcome to Arcade Galaxy, a classic kart racing universe full of fun and games. Inspired by gaming classics like Rollercoaster Tycoon and Super Mario Kart, players can join in on an intergalactic adventure full of high-speed joyrides. And for those that seek even more challenges - players can enjoy a fusion of party gaming and user-generated modes, making for nearly endless possibilities!

In Arcade Galaxy, players can seamlessly drop into matches with friends and share their creations. Create your own Cub avatar with a vast array of cosmetics and abilities. This rich customization system lets players craft truly unique identities to set them apart from the competition.

Beyond pure gameplay, the game also offers a robust level editor. With this tool, you can create and customize almost every element within the game, from racetracks, obstacles, to the behavior of objects in each world. The editor includes accessible level design tools and a visual, esay-to-use logic editor, all boasting unique features which highlight player creativity.

Once crafted, players can publish their creations with friends and even race on custom tracks. Through the logic editor, you can harness the power of a visual programming language to transform the gameplay experience. From setting traps, designing hurdles, to establishing your game rules – everything is within your grasp.

Embark on this intergalactic racing adventure, share your passion and imagination with players worldwide, and dive into the endless joys that Arcade Galaxy has to offer!


- Complete custom racing challenges using unique power-ups and skills.

- Create custom racetracks, obstacles, and game rules with an intuitive level editor.

- Share and race on user-generated tracks globally.

- Customize your Cub avatar with a galaxy of cosmetics and abilities.
